member.name: M:Disk.SDK.IDiskSdkClient.GetListAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a list of items from the specified directory asynchronously. Use the event to get a result and handle the completion of the operation.

member.name: M:Disk.SDK.IDiskSdkClient.GetListPageAsync(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a paged list of items from the specified directory asynchronously. Use the event to get a result and handle the completion of the operation.

member.name: M:Disk.SDK.IDiskSdkClient.GetItemInfoAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the disk item's information asynchronously. Use the event to get a result and handle the completion of the operation.
member.param: The path to the specified item.

member.name: M:Disk.SDK.IDiskSdkClient.MakeDirectoryAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Makes a new directory by the specified path asynchronously. Use the event to handle the completion of the operation.
member.param: The full path to a new folder.

member.name: M:Disk.SDK.IDiskSdkClient.RemoveAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Removes an item by the specified path asynchronously. Use the event to handle the completion of the operation.
member.param: The full path to the folder.

member.name: M:Disk.SDK.IDiskSdkClient.TrashAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Trash an item by the specified path asynchronously. Use the event to handle the completion of the operation.
member.param: The full path to the folder.

member.name: M:Disk.SDK.IDiskSdkClient.MoveAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Moves the specified items to a new location asynchronously. Use the event to handle the completion of the operation.

member.name: M:Disk.SDK.IDiskSdkClient.CopyAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Copies the specified items to a new location asynchronously. Use the event to handle the completion of the operation.

member.name: M:Disk.SDK.IDiskSdkClient.PublishAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Publishes an item by the specified path asynchronously. Use the event to get a result and handle the completion of the operation.

member.name: M:Disk.SDK.IDiskSdkClient.UnpublishAsync(System.String)
member.summary: UnPublishes an item by the specified path asynchronously. Use the event to handle the completion of the operation.

member.name: M:Disk.SDK.IDiskSdkClient.IsPublishedAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether an item by the specified path is published asynchronously. Use the event to get a result and handle the completion of the operation.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to https://webdav.yandex.ru/.

member.name: P:Disk.SDK.Utils.WebdavResources.AuthBrowserUrlFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to https://oauth.yandex.ru/authorize?response_type=token&client_id={0}&display=popup.

member.name: P:Disk.SDK.Utils.WebdavResources.AuthParamsFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to grant_type=password&username={0}&password={1}&client_id={2}&client_secret={3}.

member.name: P:Disk.SDK.Utils.WebdavResources.AuthUrl
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to https://oauth.yandex.ru/token.

member.name: P:Disk.SDK.Utils.WebdavResources.BadParameterErrorMesage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Incorrect parameters - provide correct data and try again.

member.name: P:Disk.SDK.Utils.WebdavResources.BadRequestErrorMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Incorrect request - provide correct data and try again.

member.name: P:Disk.SDK.Utils.WebdavResources.CheckPublishingBody
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to <propfind xmlns="DAV:"> <prop> <public_url xmlns="urn:yandex:disk:meta"/> </prop> </propfind>.

member.name: P:Disk.SDK.Utils.WebdavResources.CopyMethod
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to COPY.

member.name: P:Disk.SDK.Utils.WebdavResources.DeleteMethod
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to DELETE.

member.name: P:Disk.SDK.Utils.WebdavResources.GetMethod
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to GET.

member.name: P:Disk.SDK.Utils.WebdavResources.ItemDetailsBody
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <propfind xmlns="DAV:"> <prop> <public_url xmlns="urn:yandex:disk:meta" /> <creationdate /> <getlastmodified/> <displayname/> <getcontentlength/> <getcontenttype/> <getetag/> <resourcetype/> </prop> </propfind>.

member.name: P:Disk.SDK.Utils.WebdavResources.MakedirMethod
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to MKCOL.

member.name: P:Disk.SDK.Utils.WebdavResources.MoveMethod
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to MOVE.

member.name: P:Disk.SDK.Utils.WebdavResources.NotAuthorizedErrorMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to You must be logged in before starting to work with SDK, try to call AuthorizeAsync(...) at first.

member.name: P:Disk.SDK.Utils.WebdavResources.OutOfMemoryErrorMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The file is too large for uploading.

member.name: P:Disk.SDK.Utils.WebdavResources.PostMethod
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to POST.

member.name: P:Disk.SDK.Utils.WebdavResources.PropfindMethod
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to PROPFIND.

member.name: P:Disk.SDK.Utils.WebdavResources.ProppatchMethod
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to PROPPATCH.

member.name: P:Disk.SDK.Utils.WebdavResources.ProviderErrorMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Can't load SDK provider assembly. Add reference to the platform specific assembly 'Disk.SDK.Provider (platform)' and try again..

member.name: P:Disk.SDK.Utils.WebdavResources.PublishBody
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to <propertyupdate xmlns="DAV:"> <set> <prop> <public_url xmlns="urn:yandex:disk:meta">true</public_url> </prop> </set> </propertyupdate>.

member.name: P:Disk.SDK.Utils.WebdavResources.PutMethod
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to PUT.

member.name: P:Disk.SDK.Utils.WebdavResources.TokenRegexPattern
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to ([a-zA-Z0-9]){32}.

member.name: P:Disk.SDK.Utils.WebdavResources.UnpublishBody
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to <propertyupdate xmlns="DAV:"> <remove> <prop> <public_url xmlns="urn:yandex:disk:meta" /> </prop> </remove> </propertyupdate>.
